SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_VSS_UTIL_DIR" :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_VSS_DB_DIR#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_VSS_WORKING_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "SourceSafe Utility Directory" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VSS_UTIL_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Database Directory" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VSS_DB_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "VSS Username" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VSS_USER# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "VSS Password" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VSS_PASSWORD# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Working Directory" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VSS_WORKING_DIR# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Item" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VSS_ITEM# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Recursive" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VSS_RECURSIVE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Ignore Case" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VSS_IGNORE_CASE# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Comment" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VSS_COMMENT#
